description: 3rd year Computer Science major from San Diego. Fall'12 AM Class. I love sports mainly wrestling, baseball, and mediocre basketball. Snowboarding is my favorite thing to do and I'm obsessed with music. Chill face and turn up.
aspects: I never thought I would meet so many different people who can appreciate you for who you are. I love Lambda Chi because I can turn to any of these people for help and they would not hesitate to be there for me. It is the best support group I could have ever asked for and they have helped me see the world in so many different ways. Meeting such a diverse set of people who I can get along with has opened my mind tremendously and taught me so much as a human being. Association with the entire brotherhood of Lambda Chi has genuinely made me a better person, which I know I couldn't say if I was anywhere else.
name: Zach Plummer
